00011 EagleDbSqlSelect* EagleDbSqlSelect_New(void)
00012 {
00013     EagleDbSqlSelect *select = (EagleDbSqlSelect*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSqlSelect_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbSqlSelect));
00014     if(NULL == select) {
00015         return NULL;
00016     }
00017     
00018     select->expressionType = EagleDbSqlExpressionTypeSelect;
00019     select->tableName = NULL;
00020     select->whereExpression = NULL;
00021     select->selectExpressions = NULL;
00022     select->usedSelectExpressions = 0;
00023     select->allocatedSelectExpressions = 0;
00024     
00025     return select;
00026 }

00028 void EagleDbSqlSelect_Delete(EagleDbSqlSelect *select, EagleBoolean recursive)
00029 {
00030     if(NULL == select) {
00031         return;
00032     }
00033     
00034     if(EagleTrue == recursive) {
00035         int i;
00036         for(i = 0; i < select->usedSelectExpressions; ++i) {
00037             EagleDbSqlExpression_Delete(select->selectExpressions[i], recursive);
00038         }
00039         EagleMemory_Free(select->selectExpressions);
00040         
00041         EagleDbSqlExpression_Delete(select->whereExpression, recursive);
00042     }
00043     
00044     EagleMemory_Free(select->tableName);
00045     EagleMemory_Free(select);
00046 }
00047 
00048 int EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00049 {
00050     return select->usedSelectExpressions;
00051 }
00052 
00053 int EagleDbSqlSelect_getExpressionsCount(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00054 {
00055     int exprs = EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(select);
00056     if(NULL != select->whereExpression) {
00057         ++exprs;
00058     }
00059     return exprs;
00060 }
00061 
00062 EaglePlan* EagleDbSqlSelect_parse(EagleDbSqlSelect *select, struct EagleDbInstance_ *db)
00063 {
00064     int i;
00065     int exprCount, whereExpressionId = -1, expri = 0;
00066     EaglePlan *plan;
00067     EagleDbSqlExpression **expr;
00068     EagleDbTableData *td;
00069     
00070     if(NULL == select) {
00071         return NULL;
00072     }
00073     if(NULL == db) {
00074         return NULL;
00075     }
00076     
00077     /* create the plan skeleton */
00078     plan = EaglePlan_New(db->pageSize);
00079     
00080     /* get data */
00081     td = EagleDbInstance_getTable(db, select->tableName);
00082     if(NULL == td) {
00083         EaglePlan_setError(plan, EaglePlanErrorNoSuchTable, select->tableName);
00084         return plan;
00085     }
00086     for(i = 0; i < td->table->usedColumns; ++i) {
00087         EaglePlanBufferProvider *bp;
00088         
00089         EaglePageProvider_reset(td->providers[i]);
00090         bp = EaglePlanBufferProvider_New(i, td->providers[i], EagleFalse);
00091         EaglePlan_addBufferProvider(plan, bp, EagleTrue);
00092     }
00093     
00094     /* merge expressions */
00095     exprCount = EagleDbSqlSelect_getExpressionsCount(select);
00096     expr = (EagleDbSqlExpression**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbSqlSelect_parse.2", sizeof(EagleDbSqlExpression*), exprCount);
00097     if(NULL == expr) {
00098         EaglePlan_Delete(plan);
00099         return NULL;
00100     }
00101     
00102     for(expri = 0; expri < EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(select); ++expri) {
00103         expr[expri] = select->selectExpressions[expri];
00104     }
00105     if(NULL != select->whereExpression) {
00106         whereExpressionId = expri;
00107         expr[whereExpressionId] = select->whereExpression;
00108     }
00109     
00110     /* compile plan */
00111     EagleDbSqlExpression_CompilePlan(expr, exprCount, whereExpressionId, plan);
00112     EagleMemory_Free(expr);
00113     
00114     return plan;
00115 }
